site_name: PHASE 3, BUILDING G, KIDBROOKE VILLAGE, LONDON, SE3 9FX
description: An application submitted under Section 96a of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for a Non-Material Amendment to vary Condition 2 (Approved Plans), Condition 4 (Quantum of Development), Condition 10 (Maximum Floor Space Restrictions) of Planning Permission 19/3415/F (as amended by applications 22/2805/NM, 22/3222/NM, and 24/0823/NM) in relation to Building G within Phase 3 of the Kidbrooke Village Redevelopment comprising amendments to the following:ÿThe omission of three wheelchair (M43) units from the approved ground floor plan of G5, Phase 3, and replacement with residential amenities (residents' gym and workspace)ÿTo re-accommodate the omitted three wheelchair (M43) units (2 x 2-bed and 1 x 1-bed) from the ground floor within the same G5 core (3x 2-bed). ÿ
